author: jaz
msg: dded touch points to userLogin & changePassword services to call AuthHelper for external authentication module support. Part of the new Authentication API. This commit also includes the service changes for the new 'externalAuthId' field on UserLogin.
Part 1: define the API for external authentication modules (done rev 767281)
Part 2: update LoginServices to call AuthHelper for external modules (done)
Part 4: update LDAP implementation to use new API (not started)
